Posts.Content: LindaHatch wrote: Does anyone out there have anything good to say about taking Arimidex? It is going to be prescribed for me and I am scared to death of it. I have been recently diagnosed with a mucinous carcinoma of the right breast for which a lumpectomy, radiation and hormone therapy have been discussed. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Arimidex LindaHatch Cowgirl13
